title: Amazing 3 bed 2 bath in South Philly !!
description: You are looking at a 3 bedrooms house which is located in a friendly neighborhood, the middle of South Philly. It is a convenience place that is easy to access highway I-76 and I-95 or Center city. Just 5 minutes walking to Quartermaster Plaza which have BJs, Home Depot, Shop rite, Aldi, fastfood restaurants ..There is a large living room when you walk in. Next is a kitchen with appliances and cabinets so you can store all your kitchen aid. There is also a half bath on first floor. Walk to the second floor, there are 3 lightly bedrooms with closets. We also installed new windows for the whole house. The house has washer/dryer in the basement. Owner pays for water. Renter responsible for gas and electric. Parking is on street but there are always plenty of spaces around the house. Feel free to ask me questions if you are interested. I DO NOT pick up unknown numbers (because of telemarketing), so please leave a voicemail or text me. Thank you.

title: Enter into a living room made for entertaining or simply cozy up!
description: Just in time for the holidays; Welcome Home to 3124 N Judson Street!  This 3bd/1.5ba home boasts an open concept with modern appeal.   Enter into a living room made for entertaining or simply cozy up for an evening on those cold winter nights.  Next, you're greeted by a dining area that spans into a dreamy kitchen with newer appliances such as a double oven, sure to make cooking a breeze.  Off of the kitchen, you'll find the 1st-floor bedroom that's both spacious and secluded from the rest of the home.  From the kitchen your outdoor oasis awaits and before you ascend to the 2nd floor, you'll also notice a powder room directly off of the kitchen.  Just up the sleek staircase you'll find both the master bedroom and 2nd bedroom both designed to wow with ample closet space to boot.  And at the top of the staircase is the show-stopper bathroom that includes both a glass-encased stall shower and an original clawfoot bathtub made for soaking the day away.  Throughout this spacious home, you can appreciate luxurious flooring, warm and inviting neutral tones, and a huge basement providing laundry and additional storage.

title: This fantastic building*a peaceful living experience apartment
description:
-Perfect Rental Apartment
Welcome to 102 W Berks St! This fantastic building is ready to welcome you home! Building amenities include an elevator for ultimate convenience, virtual doorman, shared roof deck, beautiful modern fixtures, and more! Each unit was designed to provide you with a peaceful living experience within the city. You’ll love how each unit features hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, modern finishes, exposed spiral ductwork, and in-unit laundry. The modern kitchen is equipped with ample cabinetry above & below for storage, granite countertops, tile backsplash, and a full lineup of stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, built-in microwave, refrigerator, electric stovetop & oven. There are large windows for a bright and airy feel throughout, and high efficiency central a/c systems will ensure year-round comfort. Your stunning bathroom boasts modern finishes including sleek tiling, floating vanity, and great light from the sconces bordering your medicine cabinet. Unit #207 is a gorgeous 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment, offering great natural sunlight and ample living space. This wonderful apartment !About The Neighborhood :Old Kensington is an incredible neighborhood just North of Fishtown. Conveniently accessible via I-96, I-676, and public transportation bus routes and the Market Frankford Line. Close to Towey Playground, Shissler Recreation Center, Palmer Park and Palmer Doggie Depot. You’ll be surrounded by tons of shopping, dining, and entertainment options including LMNO, Goldie, Gryphon Cafe, Riverwards Produce Market, Evil Genius Beer Company, Suraya, Steap & Grind, and many more!

title: SUBLEASE 9 months left on the lease
description:
Subleasing my one bedroom/one bath apartment in The Terrace building located between Logan Square and the Comcast building.
Lease ends in September, you’ll be signing to take over my lease with the building management (Pearl Properties) and you’ll need to go through their credit/background check.
The apartment is partially furnished with a queen bed and a dining set, some kitchenware/cookware as well, all of which you can keep for free if you’d like.
The apartment comes with light fixtures and a mounted 55” TV (provided by the building, not yours to keep)
The apartment is on the 15th floor with gorgeous views from a good size balcony (I have two lounge chairs there which you can keep for free as well).
The Terrace is a nice modern building with 24 hour front desk, gym, common spaces with a pool table and other amenities (no swimming pool).
Check out their website
https://pearl-apartments.com/properties/the-terrace-on-18th/

title: 2012 Mallard Ln, 3bed/2bath.Welcome Home!
description: Welcome Home!  This lovely home is well maintained and has welcoming landscaping and front porch.  Entering the  home you notice 9ft ceilings and have a view of the open living room and kitchen area.  At the entry is a hall closet and an office to the right with a solar tube and front windows for extra lighting.  The living room has a gas fireplace.  The eat-in kitchen has a sliding glass door that features a peaceful view of a pond to watch the wildlife or sit outside on the patio and deck under the pergola to enjoy the beautiful view.  The kitchen has ample counter space with additional seating at the counter peninsula.  Enjoy cooking in a well designed kitchen with great work space, tile backsplash, Corian counters and a gas stove.  The laundry is off the kitchen and two car garage.  The main bedroom is located off the front hallway and overlooks the back yard with the main bath, with heat light, and walk-in closet at the front of the home.  The two additional bedrooms and hall bath are off the kitchen area.  The bonus room is on the second floor and  will make a great playroom or office!  The backyard is great for entertaining with a patio and Trex deck with a pergola.  The gas grill that will stay with the home is fueled by natural gas so there is no need to deal with propane tanks ever again.  The mechanicals are located in the basement and inspected two times per year.  The natural gas line is currently used for the fireplace, stove and grill so the furnace could be switched from electric to gas if desired.  There is a security system installed but is not monitored.  This is a well-maintained truly loved home!
